title: My champion is missing
body: I was looking through the store today when I noticed that I was able to buy shaco even though I had played him in the past because my friend had gifted me him. Wtf riot.

replies.body:
Hi De Middle Man,

Basically people found wracking up illegitimate referrals in the Refer-A-Friend program have had the amount equivalent to the fraud points removed from their accounts. This includes RP, IP, and some extra IP that was earned with any boosts given. If the stuff you are missing was gifted, the friend would have been the one hit by this system.

You can find more info about this from Riot here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gfX587IW-champsskins-i-was-gifted-are-gone-where-did-they-go
I want my damn clown back, I dont really have the time to save up and Im out of money at the moment, f**king riot
